test.description: SMPP-bind_transceiver (Positive) CP connects to SMSC ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Step1: Simulate a CP using XTT. Step2: Simulate a SMSC using XTT. Step3: The IP of the machine on which CP is Simulated using XTT should be whitelisted in XSAM. Step4: XSAM should be configured with the listen port (Incoming Channel).The Outgoing Channel should be properly configured Step 5: A SMS proxy service on the correct Outgoing Channel and the connection short code, should be provisioned and active. Step 6: In the XTT tool, configure proper TCP settings by providing the Remote IP address / port with the IP/port (Incoming Channel) on which XSAM is listening for connections. Step 7: Provision a "bind_transceiver" message PDU in the XTT tool and verify that all the properties have correct values. Step 8: Send "bind_transceiver" message PDU using XTT Tool. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
